quote: Honestly, I think the best advice I've gotten is from the mistakes I've learned because otherwise it wouldn't have been good advice to myself.
why_clipworthy: This moment highlights the importance of learning from failures, a key mindset for growth.
suggested_hook: Why your biggest failures might be your best teachers.

quote: Zillow honestly kind of helps save our team... we were able to diversify spread out across all of greater Los Angeles.
why_clipworthy: Shows a real-world application of using a tool to overcome market challenges.
suggested_hook: How Zillow Flex helped us pivot in a tough market.
